A1: the larger number of potholes created during
RelatedSentence: Posted on May 19 , 2014 at 9:18 a.m. MADISON -- Wisconsin lawmakers are being asked again for emergency funding to fix the larger number of potholes created during the rough winter .
The Urban Alliance and its president , Racine Mayor John Dickert , said many communities are struggling to keep up with needed repairs and his own crews are absolutely slammed right now .
